channel.title: Database error with world and online values

item.title: Database error with world and online values
item.dc:creator: @sspoke sspoke
item.description:
@sspoke wrote:

you don’t store whether or not a player is logged in or logged out in database, that would cause problems if you shut down the server incorrectly without disconnecting each player and other problems.

That information is stored in the server, you could code a simple http server in the rsps that just sends out the number of how much players online on a different port or atleast update in the database last time a player logged in using in sql query NOW() function on login. So you could do a query to see who’s login time is less then 1 hour ago to see how much players online since 1 hour ago etc…

Read full topic
item.source: Database error with world and online values
